mapper.select: select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count from board.board b, board.users u where b.user_seq = u.user_seq order by b.board_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset};

select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count from board.board b, board.users u where b.user_seq = u.user_seq and b.title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%') order by b.board_id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset};
select count(*) from board.board b where title like concat('%', #{searchWord}, '%')

select b.board_id, b.user_seq, u.user_name, u.user_profile_image, b.title, b.content, b.reg_dt, b.read_count from board.board b, board.users u where b.board_id = #{boardId} and b.user_seq = u.user_seq;
mapper.insert: insert into board.board (user_seq, title, content, reg_dt, read_count) values (#{userSeq}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), 0);
